item.title: Static Hugo site hosted on s3 with https using apache
item.description: Linode came up with their version of Amazon S3 recently. Object storage is a great way to host a static site. You don’t need a server and sites are super easy to deploy. A problem with hosting with object storage though, is that https is not natively supported. AWS users have the option of using cloudfront. This was an option for me, but I didn’t want to use two separate providers for one website.
